post.title: Cosplay Mania 2022 to Host Moona Hoshinova and Pavolia Reine
post.content:
Aside from Hololive Indonesia's Ayunda Risu and Kureiji Ollie, Cosplay Mania 2022 has announced that it is also set to host Moona Hoshinova and Pavolia Reine. The two VTubers will participate in the event's Japanese Anime Music (JAM) Concert.

This year will mark the first time that we will be having VTubers performing at Cosplay Mania's JAM concert.
Let us give a warm Filipino welcome to @moonahoshinova!#CosplayMania2022 #CosplayMania #Cosplay #Cosplayph pic.twitter.com/I8EYHhWXhx

— Cosplay Mania (@CosplayManiaPH) August 26, 2022

The first Indonesian VTuber to reach a million YouTube subscribers, Moona is part of Hololive Indonesia's first generation. She is known for making beautiful and functional structures in Minecraft, but is widely recognized for her collaborations with Hololive's Usada Pekora. She also has released singles such as 愛の小さな歌 (Ai no Chiisana Uta) and High Tide.

VTubers will be performing for the very first time at Cosplay Mania's JAM concert.
Please welcome her on her first time in the Philippines, @pavoliareine!#CosplayMania2022 #CosplayMania #Cosplay #Cosplayph pic.twitter.com/zgIeH0Cl0x

— Cosplay Mania (@CosplayManiaPH) August 26, 2022

Pavolia Reine from HoloID's second generation also has released original songs such as Gate Open: START!, あの青空のせいだ (Ano Aozora no Sei da) and Love Me Love Me. She is known for her YABE (Yet Another Brunch, Everyone) streams.

Cosplay Mania happens on the weekend of October 1-2, 2022 at SMX Convention Center Manila, Pasay City, Metro Manila, Philippines. Visit facebook.com/CosplayMania for more details.

post.description: Cosplay Mania 2022 has announced that it is also set to host Moona Hoshinova and Pavolia Reine. The two VTubers will participate in the event's Japanese Anime Music (JAM) Concert.

node.description: A few weeks ago, we reported that AniManGaki 2022, one of the biggest annual anime/cosplay/gaming events in Malaysia, will showcase 80 VTubers.
